Each says \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w their|strong="H3808"\w* \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, “\w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w never|strong="H3808"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w shaken|strong="H4131"\w*; \w I|strong="H3808"\w* \w will|strong="H3820"\w* live \w for|strong="H7451"\w* \w all|strong="H1755"\w* \w time|strong="H1755"\w* \w untouched|strong="H1077"\w* \w by|strong="H7451"\w* \w misfortune|strong="H7451"\w*.”

\w Their|strong="H4390"\w* \w mouths|strong="H6310"\w* \w are|strong="H6310"\w* \w full|strong="H4390"\w* \w of|strong="H4390"\w* \w deceit|strong="H4820"\w* \w and|strong="H6310"\w* \w oppression|strong="H8496"\w*: \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w their|strong="H4390"\w* \w tongues|strong="H3956"\w* lurks \w mischief|strong="H5999"\w* \w and|strong="H6310"\w* wrong.

Lying \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w secret|strong="H4565"\w* \w in|strong="H3427"\w* some village \w ambush|strong="H3993"\w*, \w and|strong="H5869"\w* \w stealthily|strong="H6845"\w* \w watching|strong="H5869"\w*, \w they|strong="H2691"\w* \w murder|strong="H2026"\w* \w the|strong="H2026"\w* \w innocent|strong="H5355"\w*.

Like \w a|strong="H3068"\w* lion \w that|strong="H6041"\w* lurks \w in|strong="H6041"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w secret|strong="H4565"\w* \w lair|strong="H5520"\w* \w they|strong="H6041"\w* lurk intending \w to|strong="H4900"\w* \w catch|strong="H2414"\w* \w the|strong="H2414"\w* defenceless; \w to|strong="H4900"\w* seize them, \w to|strong="H4900"\w* \w drag|strong="H4900"\w* them \w away|strong="H4900"\w* \w in|strong="H6041"\w* their \w net|strong="H7568"\w*.

\w Their|strong="H5307"\w* victims \w are|strong="H6099"\w* \w crushed|strong="H1794"\w*, sink \w down|strong="H5307"\w* \w to|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H5307"\w* ground. Under \w their|strong="H5307"\w* claws \w the|strong="H5307"\w* hapless \w fall|strong="H5307"\w*.

\w The|strong="H6440"\w* wicked say \w in|strong="H6440"\w* \w their|strong="H6440"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w* \w that|strong="H7200"\w* God \w has|strong="H3820"\w* \w forgotten|strong="H7911"\w*, \w has|strong="H3820"\w* \w hidden|strong="H5641"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \w will|strong="H3820"\w* \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w nothing|strong="H1077"\w*.

\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w do|strong="H4100"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w wicked|strong="H7563"\w* \w treat|strong="H5006"\w* \w God|strong="H3808"\w* \w with|strong="H5921"\w* contempt, \w and|strong="H3820"\w* say \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w their|strong="H5921"\w* \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w*, “\w God|strong="H3808"\w* doesn’t \w care|strong="H1875"\w*”?

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \nd \+w Lord|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w forever|strong="H5769"\w* \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w ever|strong="H5769"\w*: \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* \w will|strong="H3068"\w* vanish \w from|strong="H1471"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* land.
